articles.title: Jonas Vingegaard wins Tour de France for first time
articles.description: Jonas Vingegaard won his first Tour de France title after coming out on top of a thrilling three-week duel with defending champion Tadej Pogacar.
articles.content:
PARIS -- Jonas Vingegaard won his first Tour de France title Sunday after coming out on top of a thrilling three-week duel with defending champion Tadej Pogacar.

articles.title: Houston Texans WR John Metchie III diagnosed with leukemia
articles.description: Houston Texans rookie wide receiver John Metchie III announced Sunday that he has been diagnosed with a form of leukemia and likely will not play this season.
articles.content:

articles.title: Kurt Busch not cleared for NASCAR Cup race at Pocono
articles.description: Kurt Busch was not cleared by NASCAR's medical staff to compete in Sunday's race at Pocono Raceway.

articles.description: Brooke Henderson finished even par on Sunday to earn a one-stroke victory at the Evian Championship for her second career major title.
